hero.title: One Phrase to Rule Them All
hero.subtitle: Securely view all your crypto assets from a single seed phrase. Our platform supports multiple blockchains and keeps your data private by processing everything in your browser.

features.title: Why Choose CryptoSeed Wallet?
features.subtitle: A secure and simple way to manage your crypto portfolio.

items.title: Universal Wallet
items.description: No more switching apps. View assets from Ethereum, Bitcoin, Solana, and many more networks all in one place.

items.title: Client-Side Security
items.description: Your seed phrase is your key. It's processed only in your browser and is never sent to our servers. Ever.

items.title: Instant & Simple
items.description: Just enter your seed phrase and instantly see your portfolio. No sign-ups, no lengthy setups.
